attributes.action: Government to take urgent actions to address the extreme cost of living crisis
attributes.additional_details: Because the government/ parliament are raising prices and are the cause for the living crisis. They also have the most power to change and improve things.
attributes.background:
Help the homeless. 
Stop raising prices/ stop the crisis 
Funding 
Help people about to turn homeless

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the cost of living, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to help people with this.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Pass a law to stop standing charges on domestic bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644887

Permanently scrap green levies on energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640214

Uprate benefits in line with CPI inflation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644655

If you'd like the Government to do something else you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
